scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p js scss dist && touch js/main.js scss/style.scss dist/index.html && npm run dev
scripts.watch-sass: npm run build-sass && onchange 'scss/*' -- npm run build-sass
scripts.build-js: browserify js/main.js -t glslify -t [ babelify --presets [ env stage-2 ] ] | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/bundle.js
scripts.dev: npm run watch-sass & npm run watch-js & npm start
scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-js
